Producer: Scott Waugh, Tucker Tooley, Josh Hartnett, Simon Swart, Bradley Pilz
Rating: PG-13 (Drug Addiction|Brief Partial Nudity|Some Disturbing Images|Thematic Elements)
Synopsis: Former professional hockey player Eric LeMarque finds himself stranded on a mountain during a fierce snowstorm. Coming to terms with his personal demons, he soon rediscovers the power of faith while fighting for survival.
Title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
